This is an enormous Booster's Lab patch to increase the entity limit to 5120. To use it you will need to add a segment to your .EXE using PEONS, the default size (or anything larger) will do. Then just make sure not to edit 0x 7ECF20 - 0x 8C3000 in that segment, or your game will probably crash. You can find & replace the hex if you want to add a smaller segment. (as in, change "CF 7E" to "CF 4E.") If you want to make the limit any lower, all the checks for the max number of NPCs are at the top of the patch, and should include a "00 14 00 00".

0x41906E
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x42E54E
81 BD 2C FF FF FF 00 14 00 00

0x42E576
81 BD 2C FF FF FF 00 14 00 00

0x434360
81 7D B8 00 14 00 00

0x434382
81 7D B8 00 14 00 00

0x4629AE
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x462A01
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46EFDA
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F002
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F2C7
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F2EF
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F4F1
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F519
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F63B
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F663
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46F82C
81 7D F8 00 14 00 00

0x46FA18
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00

0x46FAC6
81 7D FC 00 14 00 00
